statements: DELETE FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND order_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 200 AND preference_1 = 'Option A';
DELETE FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 200 AND favorite_color = 'Blue'
DELETE FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_id = 100 AND order_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_name = 'Email' AND preference_value = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100 OR category = 'Electronics';
